Package org.kawanfw.commons.api.server

Provides classes and interfaces to configure the Server side of KawanSoft Frameworks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommonsConfigurator
    Interface that defines the common User Configuration for the KawanSoft Frameworks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultCommonsConfigurator
    Default implementation of the commons User Configuration for the KawanSoft Frameworks.
    SshAuthCommonsConfigurator
    A concrete CommonsConfigurator that extends DefaultCommonsConfigurator and allows zero-code client (usernname, password) authentication using SSH.

Package org.kawanfw.commons.api.server Description

Provides classes and interfaces to configure the Server side of KawanSoft Frameworks.
Includes:
  • Basic access security settings.
  • Login and password verification.
  • Getting a Connection from a DataSource.
